text: it's a job that takes your breath away
when a car plummeted off this cliff at
Roedean in the early hours of the
morning it felt nearly a hundred foot
into the sea below amazingly the driver
walked away with only minor injuries a
guy was in the car was obviously not in
a great condition
he was walking wounded managed to walk
himself up the beach I think there was
you know he was being attended by all
the medical personnel who were there
there was a ambulance paramedics so he
was well looked after there are still
fragments of the wreckage left hanging
from the cliff face the car flew through
the fence missing this concrete
promenade before landing rearend first
on these rocks in the sea emergency
services have described the drivers
escape as miraculous the car has since
been taken away but it's still
attracting plenty of attention he's very
lucky to just know where we break it out
I think it's incredible story
a little bit so much worse we were

it quite often and that's got to be an
